subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: At his first game at the Tigers’ Comerica Park, Bill Morris, who grew up in Detroit, connected with a beer vendor who, like Morris, had worked as a vendor in Nashville.
snippet: At his first game at the Tigers’ Comerica Park, Bill Morris, who grew up in Detroit, connected with a beer vendor who, like Morris, had worked as a vendor in Nashville.
